content: meet franklin quite possibly the most adorable amigurumi you ll have on your hook this season you will enjoy making this adorable gnome perfect for your holiday decorating or for gift giving or change up the colors and enjoy all year round note this is a listing for a downloadable pdf pattern to crochet your own gnome skill level advanced beginner pattern is written in english using standard american terms > please note that this pattern is > available for free on my blog > here 1 the benefit of purchasing > this pdf is an easy to read > printable and ad-free version of the > pattern gnome is approximately 11 tall depending on hat placement gnome without hat is 3 75 tall materials needed - worsted weight yarn - crochet hook size f 5/3 75 mm - 4 x 4 piece of white faux fur plus paper to make template - polyfill stuffing - stitch marker - tapestry needle sewing needle & thread scissors pattern will be available for instant download upon payment the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase 1 https //www crochet365knittoo com/crochet-christmas-gnome/
